casebody.data:
Juddson LIVELY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 22, 2019

Kinga A. Kostaniak, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Juddson Lively's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 901, 204 A.3d 104 (2019), is denied.
